mapper.sql: uid, uname, sex, certifyno, tel, address, email, opentime, isvip, lastupdatetime, vipcardid, viptime
mapper.select:
select
from t_user t ORDER BY t.opentime DESC limit #{start},#{size}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (uid, uname, sex, certifyno, tel, address, email, opentime, isvip, lastupdatetime, vipcardid) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{certifyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opentime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isvip,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vipcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_user set uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, certifyno = #{certifyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opentime = #{opentime,jdbcType=DATE}, isvip = #{isvip,jdbcType=CHAR}, lastupdatetime = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vipcardid = #{vipcardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
